```{r}
shinyApp(
  ui = fluidPage(
  theme = bs_theme(version = 4, bootswatch = "minty"),
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      ChooseCountryListUI("1"),
      ChooseIndicatorListUI("2")),
    mainPanel(
      tabsetPanel(type = "tabs",
                  tabPanel("Custom",withSpinner(tableOutput("table"), color = "#80c4ac")),
                  tabPanel("Overview"),  
                  tabPanel("XvsY"))
        ),
  )
),
  
##########################################################################
  server = function(input, output) {
    output$table <- renderTable({WDI(country = ChooseCountryListServer("1")(), indicator = ChooseIndicatorListServer("2")())})
  }
)
```
